channel.title: [Class Suggestion] The Redeemed (Blue Dragon Support)
channel.description:
Day Ability 1: The Ever Lasting Mark [PASSIVE] The Ancient runes of Corax still mark your body Despite Being weakened they still hold power. You are Immune to Night Ability's
Night Ability 1: Avatar of The Fallen Angel You Send an avatar of the Fallen angel to keep protecting an ally from death. they gain Immune to death if they don't already have it as long as the angel protects them. you are able to target yourself with this ability
Night Ability 2 direct the avatar [1-Night Cooldown] You Change the target of avatar of the fallen angel protecting someone else. if the target of avatar of the fallen angel was killed in a way the avatar can't protect, you ignore this cooldown
Lore: She was the most powerful cult leader of the cult that worships Mithras that even existed, but one night a fallen angel was was able her to free herself something that was thought near impossible. the fallen angel was banished from grace for siding with that demon in life and it used all its strength to save her. she still retains some of the power that she was able to get from him but refuse's to use them for evil purposes.
she and the angel from that day shared goal's beliefs everything. everything in the world that is evil always has a glimmer of good so matter how small I will find their's for I am the king's Angel
Night Room: The Church
Converted Class[The Ritualist Blackrose Offense
Day Ability 1: The Strengthed Mark [PASSIVE] The Ancient runes of Corax still mark your body but they have no fully grown in power but have granted you more power than what you thought. You are Immune Night Ability's and death at night
Night Ability 1: Leech The Target of this ability has its blood stolen by you, you can target each member only once and you are unable to to target other black rose members
Night Ability 2: Blood Sacrifice every target that you targeted with the steal some blood ability die's this night. if you stole your own blood or the blood of a black rose member somehow they are not killed
Lore: She was the most powerful cult leader of the cult that worships Mithras that even existed, but one a fallen angel was was able her to free herself something that was thought near impossible. the fallen angel was banished from grace for siding with that demon in life and it used all its strength to save her. she still retains some of the power that she was able to get from him but refuse's to use them for evil purposes.
however one day the black rose recruited her and even since that 1 fateful night she threw everything she stood for and started using her dark gifts again and the more she abandoned the angels teaching's the stronger her powers. and because she sided with the evil forces the fallen angel had abandoned her never again to aid her. for she was not able to save her from this path of misery
Night Room: The Church
Comments: hey there just wanted to explain some things before I end up my idea
for 1 if you are killed or converted the avatar of the angel no longer affects it's the latest target. unlike a class like a physician, the advantage of the being a redeemed is that night ability can't affect you meaning if someone blocks you. you are still able to protect making it in a way stronger but only when conditions are met. any class that attacked a target protected by the avatar simply gets a message saying your target was immune to your attack instead. your target was immune because a fallen angel was guarding it because the only people who would know who this is the black rose or some other killer.
normaly fallen angels are ment to be evil angels and that stuff, but my fallen angel is only fallen because of what I did in life and it formed a close bond with the Redeemed so really its really nice people just misunderstand it
and yes the Redeemed is a female seeing how you did request that we all think of more female characters. also the fallen angel is a...is a.... well honestly I don't even know stop asking me these things.
